shortDescription.default: This web part allows users to create a faux page hierarchy in their pages library and use it for page-to-page navigation

longDescription.default: This web part allows users to create a faux page hierarchy in their pages library and use it for page-to-page navigation.  It will ask you to create a page parent property on first use which is then used by the web part to either show a breadcrumb of the current pages ancestors or buttons for the pages children.

features.title: Breadcrumbs
features.description: Displays breadcrumbs to the current page

features.title: Child Pages
features.description: Displays a list of child pages
